name: Daniel X
description: I don’t smoke and I don’t drink to. I’m a very nice guy and I’m looking fore a nice girl In my spare time I enjoy having a nice family and friends with who I like to spend time with… But I’m not satisfied, because I’m not happy… if you are really interested in me get me on /yours for love/ join it together then get me on face bo oK I need someone to share life with. Share the small every day experiences as well as the big adventures. Someone to laugh with, to cuddle, to surprise, to make happy and to kiss. When you have someone to go through life with, the positives in life get more positive, and the negatives get less negative. As a person I’m honest and open. I cannot keep things inside and hide my emotions. Sometimes that comes with a risk of being rejected, but that’s okay, because it’s who I am. Besides this, I’m a loving man and there are no limits to what I will do for people I love and care about. I’m convinced that the girl I’m seeking has a big emphatic heart and cares for people around her. In a relationship she likes to surprise and treat others, like myself, because I have a big need to feel loved and cared for; both verbally as well as physically. Besides this, she also value a good an open communication.
